summary.p: Blurs an image in a particular direction. You can use this effect to make an image look as if it is in motion or to emphasize an animated image.

p.i: Supported by Win2D but not Windows.UI.Composition.

remarks.p: This Windows Runtime type corresponds to the D2D Directional blur effect.
